alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 12:20AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN PASSAIC...BERGEN AND ESSEX COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM EDT... At 1219 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Orange, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paterson, Passaic, Wayne, Bloomfield, Hackensack, Orange, Bergenfield, Paramus, Ridgewood, Millburn, Rutherford, Ramsey, Caldwell, Hawthorne, and Oradell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex
